QuestData.Title: Shakes O'Breen
QuestData.Description: You're all right, $n. It's not every day you come across a so-called hero that has a clue what they're doing once they get this far from home, so I'll let you in on some more work.$B$BI've a friend by the name of Shakes O'Breen. He's the captain of a crew of pirates, the Blackwater Raiders; good men, respectable as pirates go. They dock at Faldir's Cove, hidden along the southern shore.$B$BI'm sure O'Breen will have lucrative jobs for you if you're interested.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Shakes O'Breen at Faldir's Cove in Arathi Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahoy, $c. Any friend of Skuerto is a friend of mine.$B$BYou'll find plenty of work needs doin' around here. We're not sittin' in this cove twiddlin' our thumbs by choice.
